description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(314).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,886,0,0,0,0,0,0,1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[314], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 08 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[-(x^12 - x^11 + 3 x^10 - 4 x^9 + 7 x^8 - 18 x^7 + 25 x^6 + 18 x^5 + 7 x^4 + 4 x^3 + 3 x^2 + x + 1)/(x^14 + 886 x^7 - 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 21 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
